title: Blisszi
author: Blisszi
content: Lol. I decided to bring in one of our favourite game onboard. Do you love football? What's the name of your club? How long have you stay in your club? Who is your favorite player? If you're to chose best player outside your club who should that be? What's the name of your coach?Who is the best player in your football team?Do you have dual club? Will love to leave to another crush club? Alright I know my questions are much but is fun here let's know football real fans. As me I belong to Barcelona just because of one man, guess who that man is? Before he left to another club.

comments.author: Dariona
comments.body: My favorite club is Liverpool. It has a long history and many achievements. Now is a difficult period, but it happens to everyone. Sometimes it happens to everyone. That's why I cheer and keep my fists!

comments.author: DrWho42
comments.body: none but i could join one just for kicks

comments.body: I am Liverpool club fan, What is yours?
